```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
library(readr)
data_heart <- read_csv("data/jp_heart_attack_dataset.csv")
data_ship <- read_csv("data/Ship_Pfm_Dataset.csv")

data_heart 

data_ship
```


```{r}
summary(data_ship)
```

``` r
# Select a subset of variables using [ ] 
heart <- subset(data_heart, 
                 select = Age:Heart_Attack_Occurrence)

names(heart)
```

``` r
#extract data age 65 and above
heart_elder <- heart[heart$Age >= 65, ]
head(heart_elder)
```

``` r
heart_young <- heart[heart$Age < 65, ]
head(heart_young)
```

``` r
library(ggrepel)
ggplot(data=data_heart,
       aes(x = Stress_Levels,
           y = BMI)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm,
              size = 0.5) +
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = Age,
                       colour = Gender), #colour for gender
                   fontface = "bold") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0,10),
                  ylim = c(0,50)) +
  ggtitle("English")
    
```

``` r
ggplot(data=heart_elder,
       aes(x = Stress_Levels)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 20,
                 boundary = 10,
                 color = "grey90",
                 fill = "pink") +
  theme_light() +
  ggtitle("Distribution stress")
```

``` r
ggplot(data=heart_young,
       aes(x = Stress_Levels)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 20,
                 boundary = 10,
                 color = "grey90",
                 fill = "skyblue") +
  theme_light() +
  ggtitle("Distribution stress")
```

``` r
ggplot(data=heart,
```
